channel.title: How to lose items when a player dies?
channel.description:
Hello, I have a 317 server, and everytime I kill someone or they kill me, no items are lost and no items are gained.
So say I kill a player, no items are dropped and he keeps the items, no matter where we are, the same occurs when an NPC kills me.
How can I allow a players items to be lost when they die?

item.title: How to lose items when a player dies?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

remove everything to do with playerRights >= 2 or playerRights == 2 from the death method.

Read full topic
item.source: How to lose items when a player dies?

item.title: How to lose items when a player dies?
item.dc:creator: @Hayley1 Hayley;
item.description:
@Hayley1 wrote:

[quote=“ThisIsMax, post:1, topic:346963”]Hello, I have a 317 server, and everytime I kill someone or they kill me, no items are lost and no items are gained.

So say I kill a player, no items are dropped and he keeps the items, no matter where we are, the same occurs when an NPC kills me.

How can I allow a players items to be lost when they die?[/quote]
If you’re an admin, on most servers you will not drop items.

Read full topic
